title: Writers on the Range: John Fielder, the man who loved natural beauty

author: Betsy Marston
title: Writers on the Range: John Fielder, the man who loved natural beauty
description: If you’ve ever bought a calendar or coffee table book featuring the grandeur of Colorado’s 14’ers, the stunning color photographs were almost certainly by John Fielder. His output was stupendous: over 40 books of Colorado landscapes published during his career as a nature photographer, which began in 1981. No doubt he had many more books to produce before pancreatic cancer took him on Aug. 11. He was 73. One book, though, became his blockbuster, appealing to almost everybody’s curiosity about how Colorado had changed over the last 130 years. Called “Colorado, 1870-2000,” the large...

author: Ahmar Khan
title: TikTok and lattes make the perfect blend for Toronto coffee company going viral
description: Two simple words -- "my friend" -- have made Caitlin Campbell and Street Brew Coffee a global success and vaulted her into the hearts of so many.

author: Susie Burrell
title: Is your morning cup of coffee doing you more harm than good?
description: Calories from your morning coffee don’t count, right? Well, maybe they do – especially if you’re starting the day with a jumbo latte. Here’s how to enjoy your morning caffeine fix while also looking after your health.

title: Famous TikToker Hospitalized After a Terrifying 80-Foot Drop Onto Scorching Rocks
description: Caleb Coffee is a famous face right now in the world of TikTok. This 18-year-old TikToker is from California and currently has over 10 million subscribers. He first made his name on another video-sharing app called Vine in 2014. author: newsdesk@men-news.co.uk (Jada Jones)
title: Amazon's dentist-approved £25 teeth whitening solution hailed a 'game changer' amid claims it erases yellow stains and marks from tea, coffee and smoking
description: "I bought this and after 3 weeks I noticed my teeth were a lot less yellow. I recommended it to my mum who tried some of mine and after 2 weeks her teeth colour had lifted a lot. Thank you for giving back two women their smile."

author: Lawrence Bonk
title: Fans are adapting 'Twin Peaks' into a PS1-style adventure game, and there's a demo
description: You may have watched the original run of Twin Peaks so many times that you exclaim “damn fine coffee” each and every time you grab a cup, but have you ever played the story through the eyes of FBI Special Agent Dale Cooper? You’ll soon be able to do just that via the magic of video games. A small French developer called Blue Rose Team has been prepping Twin Peaks: Into the Night for a while now, and it just dropped a demo of the fan-made game.The graphics are retro and decidedly PS1-flavored, which makes sense given how the show premiered in 1990. The gameplay looks to be full of...

author: Chip Chick
title: He Went On A Date With A Girl Who Was Dressed In A Gross T-Shirt And Covered In Cat Hair, But The Date Was So Bad He Asked Her To Pay Him Back For The Coffee He Bought Her
description: This guy recently went out on an absolutely awful first date with a girl, and he’s been wondering how other people feel about paying on the first date if things start going south. To clarify, he doesn’t mean a date that didn’t work out because you found out you were not on the same page […]
